message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this valuable product. Given its worth, I believe a starting price of $11,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is a significant drop from my initial offer. Could you meet me halfway at $10,250? This reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to consider $9,750?
